name: Floating Underwater Car GELIK
description:
Floating Underwater Car GELIK
Swim Water Car Gelika - This game is a simulator control underwater vehicle! I like beautiful and powerful cars? Love spy stuff? We would like to have a car could swim under water?
Then try it first on our submarine simulator car Gelika!
Amphibious Car is fun and usually not!
Swim between the houses of the sunken city! Beautiful and big city of Atlantis!
Float on such a heavy car Gelika not very usual!
Choose your car to your own taste!
Unlock the entire fleet!
On the road, the car ride cool and under the water, try to go into a skid under the water!
Any Special Agent you will be envious of!
Surprise your friends and family, their car for diving!
Driving is easy, user-friendly interface!
Free now and play anywhere, anytime!
Thank you for using our simulator, leave us your comments and ratings, and we will make the game even better!
